Name: INFINITY CHALLENGE
About the game: ATTENTION, THE PROJECT'S DATA FOR THIS GAME WAS MOSTLY LOST BECAUSE OF A VIRUS (RANSOMWARE) AND THUS, UNTIL THE LOST WORK CAN BE INFINITY CHALLENGE An infinite 3D Rail Shooter game with procedurally generated high quality tracks! Take the challenge and defeat countless waves of enemies while traveling through a beautiful and mysterious planet (with many upcoming mysterious worlds on following updates)! Face fearsome enemies that will do whatever it takes to destroy you! Kills as many enemies, collect rings to heal and score up to be at the top of each of the track's leaderboards (LEADERBOARDS THAT WILL BE AVAILABLE IN FOLLOWING UPDATES)! If the community grows to at least 3000 players, charity monthly contests will be held where the top 5 will get juicy rewards! MAPS UPON RELEASE: Death Canyon Follow these narrow paths where abandoned facilities are as abundant as enemies. MAPS TO COME AFTER RELEASE: Frozen Wastelands An ancient frozen planet, once home to a prosperous race now long gone, nothing but forsaken structures remain... Space Graveyard Countless battles took place here, nothing but debris and scavengers remain... Archipelago A water planet, house of massive galaxy-wide communication towers. Molten World A primordial planet, nothing but rock and magma can be found. War Zone A massive space battle in the orbit of Jevris V Xylochor An ancient planet with massive cities covering its landscape. Bowels A mysterious hollow planet with endless tunnels that hide countless secrets. Thalassophobia An ancient evil lies beneath the surface of this mysterious ocean, stalking in the darkness of the deepest part of this world... Ancient Rainforest Ancient cities hidden in a mysterious rainforest where enemies are just lurking in the shadows... Derelict Space Station A massive and ancient space station, its creators and purpose are a mystery. The Unknown This is just... so weird and trippy man ENEMIES ON RELEASE X45-Anti Air Turret ENEMIES POST-RELEASE X46-EMP Turret Sentinels Crawlers Hydra Shadows Mini Bosses (May vary) Track-Specific Enemies (May vary)
